Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dmitry_mingazov.connect_four.Observable
      • com.github.dmitry_mingazov.connect_four.Model
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StandardModel

    public abstract class Model
extends Observable
    Manage board and players, keeping data about the status of the game

        Returns:
